content:
Test markdown 2

Welcome to Mindustry Tool Web, your comprehensive online resource for enhancing your Mindustry gameplay experience. Our platform offers a suite of tools designed to assist both new and seasoned players in mastering the complexities of Mindustry.
Features

Interactive Schematics Editor**: Design and share your own schematics with our user-friendly editor.
Logic Simulator**: Test your Mindustry logic scripts in a safe environment before deploying them in-game.
Resource Calculator**: Plan your resource management efficiently with our detailed calculators.
Community Contributions**: Access a library of user-generated content, including schematics, scripts, and tutorials.
Getting Started

To begin, explore our Interactive Schematics Editor or visit the Logic Simulator to test your scripts. For guidance on using Markdown within our tools, refer to the Markdown Guide.
Community and Support

Join our community forums to share your creations, seek advice, and collaborate with other Mindustry enthusiasts. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please visit our GitHub repository to report them.

Thank you for choosing Mindustry Tool Web. We look forward to supporting your journey in the world of Mindustry!

Note: This page is written in Markdown. For more information on Markdown syntax, visit the Markdown Guide.
